description: A request by an organization (buyer) to  another ogranization (seller) to determine Serviceability at a specific location. This schema should used for CREATE and UPDATE operations.
title: c

___projectId.description: An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a Buyer. A Project can be used to relate multiple Orders together.

___sellerId.description: An organization that provides products and services to a buyer. Specifically, the ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the serviceability request.

___pricingMethod.description: The pricing authority to be used to price the service details on this serviceability request. Choice of Tariff, Contract, Individual Case Basis (ICB), Other.

$eref.description: Information about the site where service is requested.
$eref.title: serviceSiteInformation

___name.description: A name by which the service site is known.

___siteAddress.description: A property address for the site. Either a Site Address, a Site Code or a Site Geographic Point must be specified.

___description.description: A description for the service site.

___siteAddressType.description: Identifies the type of the site address to follow

___siteCompanyName.description: The name of the company that is located at the Service location. This may be different from the name of the Customer that ordered services at that Service Site.

___customerName.description: The name of the end (retail) customer for the UNI.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceSiteInformation.

___additionalSiteInformation.description: Additional information about the Site. Equates to the ASR AAI field.

___id.description: An identifier for the service site.

___serviceSite.description: The service site information for the serviceability request.

___buyerId.description: A Party Role played by an Individual or an Organization that buys products and services from a Seller. Specifically, the ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the serviceability request.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person at the specific site location that is the local contact. This contact will primarily be used for gaining access to the site.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___alternateSiteContact.description: The secondary site contact for the serviceability request.

___desiredResponseDate.description: The desired date for a response to the serviceability request formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceabilityRequest-create-update.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person at the specific site location that is the local contact. This contact will primarily be used for gaining access to the site.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___primarySiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the serviceability request.

$eref.description: A representation of service capabilities being requested.
$eref.title: serviceDetailRequest

___serviceDetailItem.description: The specific details to this service.

___projectServiceSiteListId.description: The Project Service Site List's unique identifier. An identifier that is used to group a list of service sites that have a common set of requested details.

___serviceType.description: The specific type of service (e.g. Access EPL) being requested.

___id.description: Unique identifier for the Service Detail.

___serviceDetail.description: Details of the service capabilities being requested.

___pricingReference.description: The value associated with the Pricing Method selected (e.g. a contract or tariff id).
